website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a well-made popcorn machine by a trusted name, this is the one to buy.
pros: A value-priced machine with handy features, including three control positions, base storage area, plenty of power, and quiet popping action
cons: The wheels seem a bit wobbly, but this minor concern doesn't affect its performance

customer_reviews.title: POPCORN HELP
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for years. Apparently, I'm doing something wrong. The popcorn comes our chewy instead of crunchy. I heat the peanut oil for a few minutes first, then add the kernels. It pops pretty fast and I turn it out into the heated bottom. I have used several different popcorn brands including the all-in-one package that Great Northern puts out. All of it turns out chewy and nobody likes it like that.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Quality from China sure
customer_reviews.text: Really bad quality control. All the metal was badly welded. Some of the screws were bent, so I was not able to fully secure this. The glass mounts were bent not allowing for proper close. There was glue alll over the glass. The instillation booklet was wrong and missed a few steps. It would leave a lot of un popped corn left and I mean a lot. I had to jimmy rig this to make it work. I expected a lot more from the way they blast quality all over. It’s still Chinese comes from China along with all their lack of quality on everything. Just completely let down
customer_reviews.author: Ang3La

customer_reviews.title: This is the second product I purchased from Great Northern Popcorn as the first unit was severely damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived with bent wheels. I tried straightening out the rim on one of the wheels and that bent the axle. Very cheap quality. The wheels have a VERY strong chemical smell, typical of plastic or rubber products from China. The smell was so powerful that even after cleaning with multiple products, I had to leave the unit in the garage to off-gas as the smell was making everyone sick. This is the second product I purchased from Great Northern Popcorn as the first unit was severely damaged during shipping. This will be the last product I purchased from Great Northern Popcarn

customer_reviews.title: Popcorn whenever I want it!!

I simply add the oil and jalopenos a few minutes before I add the seeds. YUM! Only complaint, the red writing/coloring on the plastic popcorn cups has come off a little bit.

customer_reviews.text: Popcorn machine was easy to put together. I had only one nut that was bad. Popcorn containers print ran so I called customer service and got a replacement within a week. I haven't mastered movie quality popcorn yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible it was so cheaply made the door was upside down and the inside try did not work because the try was not attached Properly. The directions are terrible and I will not ever buy another one the quality is definitely some of the worst I have seen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very fast and packaging was great! Bought this for my dad for father’s day he absolutely loved it. I did a lot of research before buying this item and this was the most recommended item and did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality challenges
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered two but it turned out to be a good thing because there was a part missing from the cabinet on one and a bent old maids drawer hole on the second. Return went smoothly and pieced-together popper is a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean-up
customer_reviews.text: Love it and makes great popcorn. Cleaning is not bad, however would be easier if bottom tray was removable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: My Dad’s Favorite Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was my dad’s birthday gift and he LOVES it. Fun for the whole family, especially the person who refills their popcorn bucket at the movies more than once!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine poor accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The cups loosing color but the machine is great
customer_reviews.author: Gady Ginzburg

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to the Home Theater
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several model and selected this one as it appeared to have better manufacturing tolerances, pieces fit together well. Easy to assemble and use. Cleaning the popper after use is a little more difficult than anticipated. Have to take it out of the unit. This would be easier if I had three hands.
customer_reviews.author: Judi -170 Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Loved the machine and worked very well but this is after one year only. This photo is the inside top where food would touch so we can no longer use it now as the rust will get all over the popcorn. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: CDPS

customer_reviews.title: Too many unpopped kernals
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this more stars but for the life of me I can't figure out why I have so many unpopped kernals. I have the 8oz machine and use the 4oz prepackaged bags but it literally only pops about half the bag. I don't know if this is an issue with the machine or the popcorn itself. It's very frustrating that it won't just work like it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA CRUZ

customer_reviews.title: Just be careful when moving it but it's built great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This popper is great and for movies night it's awesome or events!!!

customer_reviews.title: With this easy to construct popcorn machine and the Great Northern popcorn
customer_reviews.text: With this easy to construct popcorn machine and the Great Northern popcorn, it's just like you're in the movie theater.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Walton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great popper and very easy to clean and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Winegar

customer_reviews.title: Easily assembled with the tools supplied
customer_reviews.text: This is a mean lean popcorn making machine. Easily assembled with the tools supplied. Instructions easy to follow. Bought their popcorn "kits" along with the machine. As good as it gets and I am fussy about my popcorn. Bought this for our shop break room and everybody loves it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: We had no problems putting it together. The door hangs a bit but works fine. We bought the all in one popcorn, oil, and salt packages and are very happy with the taste.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Duerksen

customer_reviews.title: Our family loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: We have family movie night every Friday - this completes it!! Also gets lots of use during football games. Buy this, plus the Great Northern 8-oz portion counts (and maybe a few bags...) and you're SET!
customer_reviews.author: Freddie B

customer_reviews.text: There was a support bar that/was dented and the gift recipient has been unable to get it replaced despite having the order number, date ordered, etc.
